20110118093131.000|20110118093131.000|CC1|     A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE    
20110118093131.000|20110118093133.000|CC1|   PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.  
20110118093133.000|20110118093135.000|CC1|    PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK  
20110118093135.000|20110118093135.000|CC1|     BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS    
20110118093135.000|20110118093137.000|CC1|  OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20110118093137.000|20110118093138.000|CC1|  SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE. 
20110118093138.000|20110118093138.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110118093138.000|20110118093141.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110118093141.000|20110118093141.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES  
20110118093141.000|20110118093142.000|CC1|        IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,      
20110118093142.000|20110118093144.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.    
20110118093144.000|20110118093144.000|CC1|   ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE 
20110118093144.000|20110118093146.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS       
20110118093146.000|20110118093146.000|CC1|    AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,  
20110118093146.000|20110118093148.000|CC1|     TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.    
20110118093148.000|20110118093148.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110118093148.000|20110118093151.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110118093151.000|20110118093153.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110118093153.000|20110118093153.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110118093153.000|20110118093155.000|CC1|    WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,  
20110118093155.000|20110118093155.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110118093155.000|20110118093157.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.  
20110118093157.000|20110118093157.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110118093157.000|20110118093200.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,  
20110118093200.000|20110118093201.000|CC1|  INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE, 
20110118093201.000|20110118093201.000|CC1|      TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY    
20110118093201.000|20110118093203.000|CC1|   LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.  
20110118093203.000|20110118093203.000|CC1|   PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN  
20110118093203.000|20110118093205.000|CC1|       HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,     
20110118093205.000|20110118093207.000|CC1|  HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
